headline: Wiley Appoints Katya Andresen to Board of Directors
summary: HOBOKEN, N.J., June 30, 2025--Wiley (NYSE: WLY), one of the world’s largest publishers and a trusted leader in research and learning, today announced the appointment of Katya Andresen, chief digital & analytics officer for The Cigna Group, to its Board of Directors.
